message: I'm offering you a premium product that I'm confident you'll love. It's a game-changer. I'm willing to let it go for $1000000, a 16.7% discount from its true value. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only offering it to you because I think you'll appreciate its exceptional quality.

If you're not satisfied, you can still back out. I'm confident you'll see the quality is still there, but I want to give you peace of mind. The price remains the same, $1000000.
I appreciate your transparency, but I'm still hesitant to buy without knowing the quality beforehand. I'd like to wait and see what the next product is like.
